title: DIGITAL PROYECTS
subtitle: Fashion 3D Renders
description:
Garment prototypes created with CLO 3D, a powerful tool that enables the creation of digital fashion files. These are some of the tasks I do with this software:

- Designing and assembling patterns and garments

- Crafting avatars and applying textures and prints.

- Conducting real-time simulations

- Creation of realistic prototypes, accelerating the process of collection making.
